description:
From sun salutations to sunny runs, the Peak to Creek Short II for men is ready for you. Designed with a sweat-wicking sun protective fabric that moves with you, this short is far from your average sporty short.

What's more, this short comes with good vibes. It's made from recycled materials in a Fair Trade Certified™ factory, so you can stay active knowing your new shorts were made to help this planet and its people stay the course.
name: Prana Peak to Creek Shorts II, 8" Inseam - Mens
